localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.body: Tomorrow is Monday! Paypal, Grayscale, Square etc will resume buying #bitcoin. Are you ready? https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF
blogPost.title: Tomorrow is Monday! Paypal, Grayscale, Square etc will resume buying #bitcoin. Are you ready? https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF
blogPost.author: PlanB

localize.full_text: 明天是星期一！贝宝(PayPal)、灰度(Grayscale)、Square等将恢复购买#比特币。准备好了吗？https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF
明天是星期一！貝寶(PayPal)、灰度(Grayscale)、Square等將恢復購買#比特幣。準備好了嗎？https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF

previous.title: Watch how traders, shitcoiners and weak hands transfer their #bitcoin to strong hands like Grayscale, Paypal, Square, MicroStrategy etc. These BTC will disappear from the market and go into deep cold storage and stay there for years. https://t.co/McpnqEelV0

localize.full_text: 看看交易员、Shitcoer和弱手是如何将他们的#比特币转移到Grayscale、Paypal、Square、MicroStrategy等强手手中的。这些BTC将从市场上消失，进入深度冷藏，并在那里停留数年。https://t.co/McpnqEelV0
看看交易員、Shitcoer和弱手是如何將他們的#比特幣轉移到Grayscale、Paypal、Square、MicroStrategy等強手手中的。這些BTC將從市場上消失，進入深度冷藏，並在那裏停留數年。https://t.co/McpnqEelV0

next.title: The Netherlands implemented these  laws 2 weeks ago. You now have to screenshot your wallet when withdrawing bitcoin from Dutch exchanges, easy but annoying. Make sure you vote people in power that protect property rights and bitcoin, and remove people who don't protect freedom. https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE

localize.full_text: 荷兰在两周前实施了这些法律。现在从荷兰交易所提取比特币时，你必须截取钱包的屏幕，这很容易，但很烦人。确保投票给保护财产权和比特币的当权者，驱逐不保护自由的人。https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 上周，我们听到传言称，美国财政部和姆努钦部长计划在他的任期结束前匆忙出台一些关于自托管密码钱包的新规定。我担心这会产生意想不到的副作用，并想分享这些担忧。

localize.full_text: 荷蘭在兩週前實施了這些法律。現在從荷蘭交易所提取比特幣時，你必須截取錢包的屏幕，這很容易，但很煩人。確保投票給保護財產權和比特幣的當權者，驅逐不保護自由的人。https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 上週，我們聽到傳言稱，美國財政部和姆努欽部長計劃在他的任期結束前匆忙出臺一些關於自託管密碼錢包的新規定。我擔心這會產生意想不到的副作用，並想分享這些擔憂。
